name: Nancy Hitschfeld
content: Nancy Hitschfeld Nancy Hitschfeld Kahler Scopus ID: 8871330400 Google Scholar Nancy Hitschfeld Dblp Nancy Hitschfeld I am full professor at the Departamento de Ciencias de la Computación(DCC), Facultad de Ciencias Físicas y Matemáticas(FCFM), Universidad de Chile, where I am working since 1986. I obtained the bachelor's and master's degrees in Computer Science at Universidad de Chile in 1984 and 1987, respectively. I received the doctor's degree in Technischen Wissenschaften at the Eidgenoessischen Technischen Hochschule, Zürich (ETH-Zürich), Switzerland in 1993. Research Interests My current research areas are polygon/polyhedron meshes, gpu computing, and computational science and engineering Contact Information DCC FCFM, Universidad de Chile Beauchef 851, Santiago, Chile E-Mail: nancy@dcc.uchile.cl Personal Information I was born in Puerto Octay, X Region, Chile I have two children, Irma and Bruno Images from current and past research projects aa Developed by BScheihing Maintenance
